name-ownership.name: Add Summoner's Name to Summon's Name
name-ownership.hint: Modify the Summon's name to show who summoned it, IE 'Giorno's Goblin' etc.

effect-ownership.name: Add Summon's Owner Effect
effect-ownership.hint: Adds an effect to summons with an icon of the token that summoned them for easier tracking

rank-upgrade.name: [House Rule] Summon Spells are Rank + 1
rank-upgrade.hint: Warning: I take no responsibility for how this might impact the balance of your games. This rule treats summon spells as if they were 1 rank higher for the sake of which creatures they summon

scale-to-max-summon-level-for-rank.name: [House Rule] Summon Spells Scale to Max Level
scale-to-max-summon-level-for-rank.hint: Warning: I take no responsibility for how this might impact the balance of your games. This uses PF2e Workbench's Scale to level code to scale creatures summoned via traditional summoning spells (IE Summon Animals etc.) to the stats of a creature of the highest level that spell rank can summon.

handle-living-graveyard-movement.name: [Necromancer] Handle Living Graveyard Movement
handle-living-graveyard-movement.hint: If enabled when a Living Graveyard is moved it will send a chat message which when clicked will cause the graveyard to spawn a thrall (as in accordance with the rules)

token-with-art.name: [Filter] Default to Tokens with Art Only
token-with-art.hint: Have the actor picker default to showing only actors with art by default

living-graveyard.thralls: The Living Graveyard has moved. If this was from Sustain, Do you want to summon 3 new Thralls along its path?

critical-explosion.name: Critical Explosion
critical-explosion.description: Your mines explode in a cloud of shrapnel that shreds through a creature's weakest points to cause lasting harm. Add your Intelligence modifier to your mines' damage. A creature that critically fails its saving throw against one of your mines is additionally dealt persistent damage equal to your Intelligence modifier. If the mine dealt physical damage, this is persistent bleed damage. Otherwise, the persistent damage is of the same type dealt by the mine.

thrall-expiration.name: Effect: Thrall Expiration Date
thrall-expiration.description: This measures how long till this thrall expires.
